body:
The reason i am leaving is  people are complaining about kit sniper from nexus.and i dont wanna start a war again to get it back.anyway its about losing something that i cant do something about to protect it.so i am going to another server where my irl friends are there can i get a high rank.
and create a server with friends where i can make decisions. I wish.i can get a server/website like this but i have to work for that.i wanna hoist our own flag.so bye guys i had a great time here .killerbye i will never forget what u did for me if i got money i buy u a rank.you guys are going to see me walking around the server because i am making a goodbye video but only when i got my elgato game capture hd.

title: I think my time is done here :(
